tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    detection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    fraud_type VARCHAR(255),
    is_fraud BOOLEAN,
    details JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    user_id INT,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL
);
